scripts.codegen:check: tmp=$(mktemp -d) && OUTPUT_TS="$tmp/ts" OUTPUT_RS="$tmp/rs" bun run --filter @thaumic-cast/protocol generate && diff -rq packages/protocol/generated/typescript "$tmp/ts" && diff -q packages/protocol/generated/rust/mod.rs "$tmp/rs/mod.rs" && rm -rf "$tmp" || (rm -rf "$tmp" && echo 'Generated types are out of sync. Run: bun run codegen' && exit 1)
scripts.desktop:icons: cd desktop && cargo tauri icon src-tauri/icons/icon.png && rm -rf src-tauri/icons/ios src-tauri/icons/android src-tauri/icons/mipmap-* src-tauri/icons/AppIcon-* src-tauri/icons/Square* src-tauri/icons/StoreLogo* src-tauri/icons/*.icns
